name: DifferentLeague
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: different league
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Each week, Scott Minto is joined by big names from the world of soccer and Racing Post experts to:

- discuss the big stories
- look back at previous results
- preview the big upcoming games
- give their tips for the weekend

New episodes are available every Wednesday.

++ Responsible gambling ++
This skill is for persons aged 18+. Please gamble responsibly.

Help with problem gambling is available from the following organisations:
Gamble Aware: https://begambleaware.org
GamCare: https://www.gamcare.org.uk
Gamblers Anonymous: https://gamblersanonymous.org.uk

++ Further information and feedback ++

Visit https://spotlightsportsgroup.com for more information.

Please contact alexa@spotlightsportsgroup.com with any feedback on this skill.
